column6: Top Dog arrives on the scene as the X-Babies continue their quest to take down the new bosses of Mojoworld. And if that's not enough, the X-Babies come face-to-face with their adorable replacements! Plus a last page that'll...well, we don't want to spoil it. PLUS - A Star Comics reprint! Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | inker:Jacob Chabot | writer:Gregg Schigiel | colorist:Emily Warren | penciller:Skottie Young
